wikipedia_page.main: Sir Geoffrey Gould Briggs (6 May 1914 – 12 May 1993) was an English lawyer and judge. He was Chief Justice of Hong Kong in the 1970s and of Brunei in the 1980s.

link_mentions.page: Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Hong Kong

response: * Sir Geoffrey Briggs, Chief Justice of Brunei and of Hong Kong, 1973-9

link_mentions.page: Chief Judicial Commissioner for the Western Pacific
response: | Sir Geoffrey BriggsApril 1962. The QUEEN has been pleased to give directions for the appointment of Geoffrey Gould Briggs, Esq., Puisne Judge, Unified Judiciary of Sarawak, North Borneo and Brunei, to be Chief Justice designate to the High Court of the Western Pacific.
